t: Watch Casting Calls | Prime Video
s: Almost every classic Hollywood role was hotly pursued behind the scenes. This series looks at the most famous roles of all-time and reveals the stories behind how they were cast, which other actors were considered, and how your favorite stars landed the part.

t: Amazon.com: Casting Calls Casting Director Mailing Labels Television Auditions, Acting in Feature Films, Stage Acting Book Hollywood Acting Book 325+ Updated Daily : Movies & TV
s: Plain and simple. The best way to get seen by casting directors is to send them your photo while they are casting. If you are right for a part they will send you the script and schedule you to either meet them in person or video yourself reading the part and where to send it.
